DOC.brief_summary: This registery show medical care patient Type 2 Diabetes ( T2D ) GP-offices . Furthermore data co morbidity risk factor evaluate . Objectives NIS ( cross-sectional study ) : - To evaluate characteristic co-morbidities existent patient T2D GP level , - To evaluate representative profile patient T2D Austria , - To evaluate medical therapy use .
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus type II Diabetes mellitus type I Gestation diabetes Induced diabetes
